EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Electric Cloud - From DevOps to Dev-Test-Ops - EMEA - 2015.05.28.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: From DevOps to Dev-Test-Ops - Automate Your End-To-End Software Pipeline
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From DevOps to Dev-Test-Ops - Automate Your End-To-End Software Pipeline
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget about our new upcoming webinar, “From DevOps to Dev-Test-Ops - Automate Your End-To-End Software Pipeline”! Join Electric Cloud and Tricentis as we demonstrate proven techniques to ensure your software quality by automating more of your end-to-end software development lifecycle, including testing. In the webinar you will learn:
- How DevOps practices help your Dev, QA and Ops Teams work more efficiently - How test automation eliminates manual handoffs and increases coverage - How detecting errors quickly can help developers optimize quality
Our “From DevOps to Dev-Test-Ops - Automate Your End-To-End Software Pipeline” webinar will take place on May 28th, 2015, starting at 1:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7850805857647497730>
<https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7850805857647497730> Thu, May 28, 2015 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. CET 7:00 a.m. – 8:00 a.m. EST
Anand Ahire Director, Product Management Electric Cloud
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
